title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.9 - Contests and refunds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 86.9 - Contests and refunds

State Regulations
A manufacturer or wholesaler may offer contest prizes, premium offers, refunds and like items directly to consumers, as long as
officers, employees and representatives of other licensees are excluded from
participation. Advertising or promotion of such contests, offers, refunds or
the like may include, but need not be limited to, point-of-sale advertising, entry blanks and the like, placed in a retailer's premises. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
86.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
